developer.name: Alexei Parphyonov
developer.title: Full-Stack JavaScript Developer
bio: Was born in 1987 in Slavgorod, Altai Krai, USSR.
Graduated from the Linguistic Institute of the Altai State Pedagogic Academy in 2009 as Translator and Interpreter of English and German.
In 2009 moved to Saint Petersburg and worked as hotel concierge until 2016.
In 2014 started to be interested in programming.
In 2018 tried and continued with Treehouse Techdegree.
